body:
## Expected Behavior
SimulatedTimeoutException of ScheduleToStart type should not be retried.

## Actual Behavior
FileProcessingTest.testHostFailover test demonstrates that it is retried according to the retry policy.

comments.body: There is no more simulated timeout exception in temporal java-sdk for some time, support of that class was incorrect and was making error handling convoluted. We will implement this or another mechanism like that when it's needed from scratch.

title: Do not retry SimulatedTimeoutException
